Amate vincere? Perfetto vi invito a comprarlo.. Perché e bello? No.. Perché e bilanciato? No... E fatto bene? No.. Per i DLC. Facile prendine uno qualsiasi anzi comprateli tutti.
Se ci stava Chloe era perfetto.

Apro steam cambio la recensione, la cambio in modo positivo ? no. anzi aggiungo che anche il nuovo DLC e p2w, A si vuoi sapere se hanno sistemato o hanno messo delle opzioni decenti, tipo settare lo schermo la luminosità le ombre o cose simili. Assolutamente no tranquillo 4 anni ed rimane sempre uguale.

I have had so much fun playing this game. I started playing it on PS4 when it came out for free with the Playstation Plus subscription. I played it for countless amounts of hours; with friends and without, this game is always enjoyable. If you are a fan of scary/horror movies, this is a perfect balance between being cinematic but still playable (comparing to Heavy Rain & Detroit: Become Human). The music is fantastic, the cosmetics and designs are so delightfully creative, and all of this combined with the collaborative/strategic, objective-based gameplay keeps it incredibly exciting. 

Some people will post angry reviews about server lag, bugs, blah blah. I think these are fair reasons to be disappointed, but do not warrant the discrediting of the entirety of the end product here: an immersive, heart-racing thriller that not only delivers a unique gameplay experience, but one that also includes familiar themes from popular movies & shows (Halloween, Stranger Things, Scream, etc). 

With all of the above stated, for $20, this is an absolute steal. And if you can get while it's on sale ($7.99 at the time of this review), then more power to you. I got this game on PS4 for free, purchased it on PC, and also purchased it on Nintendo Switch - if that's any indicator of how much enjoyment it has brought me.

Обновы обновами. Игра стала лучше. Багов стало в разы меньше. Но минусы все же остались. Жуткий дисбаланс. Против убийцы 16 ранга после пары побед попадаются пати выживших из 8х и 3х рангов. Если пару раз проиграть то сурвы 18-16. Средне скилловых в игре как будто нет. Либо слишком просто, либо слишком сложно.

2 types of ppl play DBD
1) Those who have no life
2) Those who have most things they desired in life
很不错的游戏，推荐有兴趣的朋友们都来玩一玩。这个游戏可以当恐怖游戏玩，也可以当搞笑游戏玩，就算很菜也可以玩得很欢乐。最重要的是，游戏氛围好，游戏里面没那么多该选啥该怎么打的扯皮。作为一个菜到家的萌新，玩得挺开心的，每局都在发电机的爆炸声中愉快地给鬼送出人头，欢声笑语中打出GG。

真他娘的好玩，我还要充钱。希望服务器连接稳定一些，和好友玩耍的心情被匹配 的漫长等待折磨得死去活来。
游戏里面个个都是人才，说话又好听，超喜欢在里面玩。
